title: What are the best fun learning apps for kids? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here it is. It has eevrything you looking for. http://kidsfunlearn.com/ This educational app is explicitly designed for educational purposes with lots of fun baked in to keep children learning. This app contains many types of educational items and kids really love it. It has amazing graphics for each category, including :      AlphabetsDomestic AnimalsWild AnimalsSea AnimalsBirdsNumbersFlowersNursery RhymesShapesColorsTransportationsSportsPeople at workVehiclesProfessionsPlanetsVegetablesWeekdaysMonthsYour child can watch amazing images of Alphabets, Animals, Birds, Flowers and many more. This app is very easy to use for children. Just open the Alphabet category and start watching images and listen to the sound to reinforce the learning. The animated photos and sounds attract kids to learn based on their interest. This app helps them to improve their basic knowledge with fun and they enjoy rhymes. With this app, kids quickly learn things fast and easy with lots of fun. Each category has many photos for lots of fun learning!

While looking for learning apps for kids. There are two main factors that we need to consider. The actual learning imparted through the app. You will find many fun apps out there on store, which are really good when the fun part is considered, but scores very low on learning. So they end up being just another fun game. The second parameter is kids engagement in the app. Its very important that the kid remain engaged. If you have some app that is playing some rhymes only, it won’t help kid in learning as much as an app that asks kids to perform some tasks. Based on the above. I love the following app. Preschool Monkey : Kids Games on the App Store  The above app has got various learning activities, best suited for 2 to 4 years old. The app is simple to use.
